OVERVIEW
=========================================================
This directory houses GAUSS code for BLP (1999) "Voluntary Export Restraints on Automobiles: Evaluating a Trade Policy".


SOURCE
==========================================================
Archive.org's cached version of Levinsohn's original (UMichigan) website:
https://web.archive.org/web/20050430123542/http://www-personal.umich.edu/~jamesl/verstuff/instructions.html.

Accessed on July 16, 2014.


DESCRIPTION
==========================================================
The most important files are:
base.prg              - Main script to run and perform all computations.
struc-inst-steve2.arc - Contains most procedures called by base.prg.


NOTES
==========================================================
